text:
I have a service that is writing to a logfile via a FileAppender.
After logging a new line, I do not see the file size or modification date change in my windows explorer. I have a Tail application that keeps a connection open to the logfile and it doesn't show any changes either. 
Only when I open the file itself, do you see the file size and modification date change. Additionally, the new information also shows up in the Tail application.

This is not a problem with XP, 2003, or Linux.
